item.title: Step Wars: Realistic Expectations and the Five Saving Graces
item.description: Adult stepfamilies can be satisfying and heartwarming when parents, adult children and grandchildren work together as a healthy and happy family unit. This video is about the ground-breaking book, Step Wars by Grace Gabe, M.D. and Jean Lipman-Blumen, Ph.D. which gives helpful strategies parents and adult stepchildren need to deal with common anger issues.
